Career Profile

Results-oriented operations director. With 14 years of experience in managing technology teams and stimulating innovation to achieve business goals. A proven track record in developing and implementing technology and management strategies aimed at promoting a collaborative environment and responsibility to improve operations.

Looking for a technical director position to leverage my expertise in leadership and strategic planning.

Experiences

Head of Global Datacenters & Cloud Services

2017 - Present
Sodexo, Issy-les-Moulineaux

Management of infrastructure and operations for Sodexo countries by implementing a multimodal approach. Led the datacenter strategy by implementing an hybrid cloud approach and rationalized the datacenter locations. Manage the global contracts for the perimeter. Led the RFP and transition to new Management Service Provider.

  • Management of multidiciplinary and international team (20 people).
  • Implemented hyperconverged datacenter blueprint, reducing datacenter surface by 30%.
  • Led the global virtualization strategy.
  • Management of budget, forecast and recharges (40M€).
  • Introduction of recycling in the procurement process.
  • Implemented Datadog and observability processes.
  • Led the IT for IT developments for tools integration.
